In fact, while Eric Schmidt had his hand on the helm, values were changed to go where the money was. News of the change overshadowed an otherwise solid financial year for Google. There is really no one else in the universe that could have accomplished what Eric Schmidt has done, Larry Page said. Although he tried to debunk the idea in Thursday's interview, Eric Schmidt may have been growing weary of all the attention and prosaic duties that come with running one of world's most scrutinized companies.
